name: local-LLM-with-RAG (amscotti)
description: [项目级] Running local Language Language Models (LLM) to perform Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)。来源: https://github.com/amscotti/local-LLM-with-RAG

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Running local Language Language Models (LLM) to perform Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)

来源: https://github.com/amscotti/local-LLM-with-RAG
语言: Python
Stars: 271

genes.title: 安装与快速开始
genes.content:
1. Clone this repository to your local machine.
2. Install UV using instructions from the Astral site, [Installation](https://docs.astral.sh/uv/#installation)
3. Create a virtual environment and install required Python packages by running `uv sync`
